name: Project Blood Bounder
description:
Project Blood Bounder is a Sci-fi, supernatural hack n' slash action game made using Unreal Engine 5. In Project Blood Bounder, your given an supernatural ability to heal upon dealing damage to enemies. Many mechanics allow you to close the gap between you and the enemy both while in the air or on the ground. There are many combos available which can be performed by mixing attacks or pausing in-between attacks.

Currently Project Blood Bounder is in the prototype stage and has minor bugs. Many aspects of Project Blood Bounder can be improved such as UI system, AIs, and Player Character. Here are some known bugs that appear occasionally, but SHOULD NOT crash, break, or cause any haywire to the game: (If anyone experiences bugs that cause the game to not function PLEASE CONTACT ME)

KNOWN BUGS:

  • Execution fails to kill enemy and does not play animation
  • Enemies stuck in attack animation
  • Attack collisions misses
  • Sword Warp teleports player slightly lower than the enemy while in air

IMPORTANT INFO:

  • By April of 2023, Project Blood Bounder will no longer receive any major updates. Small updates may be made to optimize or fix major bugs.
  • Please check my profile for further information regarding Project Blood Bounder or any other projects!

SYSTEM SETTINGS & REQUIREMENTS: 

  • Graphics Settings can not be changed
  • Graphics are set to medium 
  • FPS is clamped to 60fps
  • Resolution is set the windowed at 1280 x 720 (720p)

RECOMMENDED SYSTEM:

  • OS: Windows 10 or higher
  • GPU: GTX 1650 or better
  • RAM: 8GB or more

ADDITIONAL NOTES: (NOT EXTREMELY IMPORTANT)

  • Project Blood Bounder does not have any SFX so listen to some music while you play! 👍
  • A short cinematic will play at the start of the level to give the game some time to compile textures and shaders to avoid future stutters and lag. (Cinematics can't be skipped)

BASIC CONTROLS: (Controls can not be changed while in game)

(Has controller compatibility, but personally recommend keyboard & mouse)

  • WASD / L Stick - Move
  • Mouse / R Stick - Move Camera
  • Light Mouse / X - Light Attack
  • Right Mouse / Y - Heavy Attack
  • F / B - Execute
  • Space / A - Jump
  • Tab / LB - Target
  • C / RT - Dodge
  • P / Menu Button - Pause
  • Q / R Stick - Switch Target Left
  • R / R Stick - Switch Target Right

(OPEN PAUSE MENU IN GAME TO SEE MOVELIST)
